short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds to any google calendar meeting its estimated cost according to the number of attending persons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a POC version of Meeting Cost Addon
The app adds a calculation of cost (attendance time) per each meeting in your calendar so you will be able to see how much money is wasted on meetings.

This version is just a POC to see if there is any interest for such an app.
known issues:
* Rooms are calculated as participants in the meetings
* each meeting is considered as 1 hour and there is a single price of $50 per person, per hour

Please contact me if you like the idea and have features requests, i will develop more features if i will see there is enough interest in the app :)
